title: Effective Implementation Strategies for Online Team-Based Learning (TBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Non-real-time collaborative learning requirements in smartphone-centric limited technology environments. Need to establish formative assessment-centered feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate asynchronously with team members in an online TBL environment to complete language tasks.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate in individual Reading Assessments (iRA) and Team Reading Assessments (tRA).
Learners improve their ability to apply language knowledge by 20% through online TBL activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
